about.title: ABOUT
about.description: Hi, I'm Mimi, a freelance front-end engineer based in Sapporo, Hokkaido. My background includes a degree in Marketing and studies in Hotel Management in Canada, giving me a unique perspective on user needs and digital experiences. I'm fluent in Japanese, French, and English, with some Korean. While my focus is front-end development, I also have a working knowledge of Java.
whatIdoList: HTML: Proficient in creating semantic and accessible website structures.
CSS: Skilled in styling web pages for visual appeal and responsiveness across various devices.
JavaScript: Experienced in developing interactive and dynamic user interfaces and functionalities.
React: Expertise in building reusable components and scalable web applications.
whatIdoList2: PHP: Proficient in developing server-side applications and APIs.
Laravel: Experienced in building robust and scalable web applications.
Java: Proficient in developing server-side applications and APIs.
